programme.title: That Fiery Girl
programme.desc: Death and destruction are the order of the day after a bandit's daughter learns some painful truths about her past.

programme.title: A Friend From Inner Space
programme.desc: Sek Kin takes a refreshing break from his usual villain's role, playing a friendly ghost who befriends a young boy and helps him reunite his separated parents.

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: Starring teenage heartthrob Pat Ting Hung, this film marks the directing debut of the kung-fu film genre's most respected figure, Chang Cheh.

programme.title: When the Clouds Roll by
programme.desc: A doctor falls for a schizophrenic old classmate he's treating who refuses to accept that her lover is dead.

programme.title: Usurpers of Emperor's Power
programme.desc: When Prince Li of the Sung Dynasty is exiled with his lovely wife and faithful warrior, Li Lan, he later commits suicide. Now, it is up to Li Lan to avenge him.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical production features George Lam in a humorous tale of a man who seeks love and success in a world of TV commercials, along with his two friends.

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: Based on a true story, a girl named Suki aspire to fulfill her dream after leaving with her cheating boyfriend. Later, when invited to attend his wedding, she schemes to have her revenge.

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: 5-category nominee & winner in Best Editing & Best Original Screenplay at the 2016 GHA, this crime thriller is produced by Johnnie To & Yau Nai-hoi

programme.title: Kill Mobile
programme.desc: Tong Da Wei & Ma Li star in the comedy of the year, in which seven friends share all messages & calls on their cell phones in a party game. Expectedly, secrets are revealed in the most hilarious way!

programme.title: Wine War
programme.desc: Leon Lai's directorial debut stars Zhang Han Yu in a story that revolves around an age-old feud between rivaling vineyards and a historical mystery.

programme.title: Days of Being Wild
programme.desc: This award-winning movie tells the story of Yuddy, an orphan who is callous towards any women who falls for him. One day, Yuddy sets out on a fateful journey to find his mother.

programme.title: Surprise
programme.desc: A youth with magical powers, who dreams of ruling his village, finds his life turning upside down with the arrival of a Tang monk & his three disciples.

programme.title: Hello Babies
programme.desc: Eternal rivals Lui Ming and Yeung Wai are in a race to be the first to get a grandson. Lui hires the superstar midwife Gong San to "supervise" their sons and nephews to make it happen.

programme.title: Somewhere Winter
programme.desc: It's 1991. A university student meets a Taiwanese photographer at a concert at Beijing Workers' Stadium and thus, begins a whirlwind romance with far-reaching implications.

programme.title: MBA Partners
programme.desc: From the director of You Came From The Stars, this feel-good drama is partially shot in the USA & charts the friendship that bonds three women.

programme.title: The Golden Job
programme.desc: Former mercenaries reunite for a noble heist only to realize that one of them is double-crossing them. Filmed across Europe & Asia and stars Ekin Cheng, Jordan Chan, Michael Tse, Jerry Lamb & Chin Ka Lok.

programme.title: 10,000 Miles
programme.desc: In his first movie as a producer, Jay Chou went the distance for his multi-billion ultramarathon film by bringing in a top-notch VFX team from Hollywood.

programme.title: The Thousand Faces of Dunjia
programme.desc: Scripted and produced by Tsui Hark, this fantasy film depicts a group of warriors protecting the world from a monster invasion. Starring Zhou Dong Yu, Aarif Lee & Ni Ni.
